TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_gong_Hkawan, title = gong_Hkawan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/gong_Hkawan} }

S.FORM: ki'an quilh balay ga cyux maki gong Hkawan. mqyanux na sraral sraral ga pitu ngnsal qalang myan,mwah pcbaq muya pinbahuw lga wal maki Sqoyaw qalang qasa la.
ki'an qoilh balay ga cyox maki gong Hkawan. mqyanox na sraral sraral ga pito ngnsal qalang myan,mwah pcbaq moya pinbahow lga wal maki Sqoyaw qalang qasa la.
